attributes.action: Remove David Lammy as an MP
attributes.background: David Lammy has called on Parliament to "stop this madness" and block Brexit. If you remove the democratic voice then you are left with fascism. If David Lammy doesn't believe in democracy he has no right representing either the house or the people of this country and should be removed as an MP.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
